ComicInfo.Series: Ten Years of Love and Rockets
ComicInfo.Title: The Fake Santa Claus Throws a Plan; Las Monjas Asesinas; La Chota vs. Roy Cowboy; Locas Tambien; Be Bop a Luba; Is it 10 Years Already?; Space Case
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fake Santa Claus Throws a Plan: The fake Santa gets blasted by a fart.
Las Monjas Asesinas: Maggie wants to know if Hopey is going back to California. The duo meet Maya in a conversation that starts out awkwardly.
La Chota vs. Roy Cowboy: La Chota punches out Roy.
Locas Tambien: Hopey kicks out Tony and Joey due to their insults and then goes with Maggie to the Foodmart.
Be Bop a Luba: Heraclio visits Luba, who has recently given birth to her seventh baby Concepcion.
Is it 10 Years Already?: The duo break the fourth wall and repeat things that have been said to them over the years.
Space Case: Guadalupe tries to find out if the sky goes on forever.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:59:08. [Issue ID 796367]
